summary: REQ-39 appears implemented by wiring the Admin “Access Denied” screen’s “Back to Login” button to an explicit navigate({ to: '/admin/login' }) flow. REQ-40 is not evidenced in the diff: the admin login UI and frontend/README.md updates communicating default username `admin` and URL `/admin/login` are not shown. The diff also introduces broader token-based admin login/logout behaviors that were not requested and may conflict with stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin login UI displays the default username as `admin` and does not contradict it elsewhere in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided AdminLoginPage snippet shows generic copy (e.g., "Enter your credentials" and a username placeholder "Enter username"), but no explicit in-app text stating the default username is `admin`. The file is truncated, so there is no reliable evidence this was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: frontend/README.md explicitly states: admin login URL `/admin/login` and default admin username `admin` (in English).
missing_requirements.reason: No diff entry shows any change to frontend/README.md, so there is no evidence the documentation was updated.
evidence: File diff summary: Modified files list does not include frontend/README.md

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced username/password admin login token issuance flow via actor.adminLogin(...) and sessionStorage token persistence.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly include not changing the admin authentication mechanism/token issuance; requirements only ask to fix navigation and clarify default credentials. The diff shows new/expanded login mechanics and token storage logic beyond those requirements.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLoginPage.tsx (calls actor.adminLogin(username, password); stores 'caffeineAdminToken' in sessionStorage; redirects to '/admin')
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage.tsx (reads 'caffeineAdminToken' from sessionStorage; redirects to '/admin/login' if missing)

hallucinated_features.description: Added an admin logout flow calling a backend method actor.adminLogout(adminToken) with cache clearing.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-39/REQ-40 (navigation fix + credential communication). This is additional admin behavior beyond the stated scope.
